item.title: What Are Git Tags and Github Releases?
item.description: Git tags on git commit tree illustration Before getting deeper in to git tags, lets first understand the basics information provided by a software package to its users. Components of a release release notes and a packaged software bundle or binaries What are git tags exactly and why need them? Git tags are specific points in the history of your repository, which you might want to rollback in case anything bad happens.
